segments.text: I look at the girl, her expression filled with hope, and it fills me with warmth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, arm raised, anticipation bright in her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t ignore the precariousness of the whole situation; it makes my gut twist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s on that stool, and even the slightest shift could send him crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent joy contrasts sharply with the chaos of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how carefree they are, while the woman goes about her business, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s excitement is infectious, yet I feel the weight of what could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about the broken dishes, the slip on the wet floor—it’s all so close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a mix of sweet innocence and reckless abandon, and I’m torn between watching and intervening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the woman would notice, perhaps she could save them from their folly.
segments.speaker: PAR
